com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview

Interface SmartGraphEdge<E,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Type stored in the underlying edge
    V - Type of connecting vertex
    All Superinterfaces:
    SmartStylableNode
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SmartGraphEdgeBase<E,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SmartGraphEdgeCurve, SmartGraphEdgeLine

    public interface SmartGraphEdge<E,V>
extends SmartStylableNode
    A graph edge visually connects two Vertex of type V.
    Concrete edge implementations used by SmartGraphPanel should implement this interface as this type is the only one exposed to the user.
    See Also:
    Vertex, SmartGraphPanel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge<E,V> getUnderlyingEdge()
      Returns the underlying (stored reference) graph edge.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview.SmartStylableNode

        setStyle, setStyleClass
